generated_body: In the article titled "As L.A. ports automate, some workers are cheering on the robots," the user is likely to find a discussion on the growing trend of automation in Los Angeles ports and its implications for the workforce. The piece may outline how automation technologies are being implemented to enhance efficiency and reduce labor costs, while also highlighting the perspectives of workers who support these changes, possibly due to the promise of safer or less physically demanding jobs. It is likely to explore the balance between technological advancement and job security, providing insights into how the workforce is adapting to these developments.
